DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: The supplementation of Ergocalciferol (Vitamin D2) to those with Vitamin D deficiency in the Chronic Kidney Disease population requiring recombinant human erythropoietin for the treatment of anemia related to kidney disease will reduce the dose of erythropoietin required to maintain a nonanemic state.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Ergocalciferol on Erythropoetin Stimulating Agent Dose
